changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE list ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, owner VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, yaml TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, created TIMESTAMP DEFAULT now() NOT NULL )

CREATE TABLE recipient ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, first VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, last VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, list INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES list(id), yaml TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, source VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, created TIMESTAMP DEFAULT now() NOT NULL )
CREATE TABLE lane ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, owner VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, yaml TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, created TIMESTAMP DEFAULT now() NOT NULL )

CREATE TABLE letter ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, lane INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES lane(id), active BOOLEAN DEFAULT false NOT NULL, liquid TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, yaml TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, created TIMESTAMP DEFAULT now() NOT NULL )

CREATE TABLE campaign ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, list INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES list(id), lane INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES lane(id), active BOOLEAN DEFAULT false NOT NULL, yaml TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, created TIMESTAMP DEFAULT now() NOT NULL )

CREATE TABLE delivery ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, recipient INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES recipient(id), campaign INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES campaign(id), letter INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES letter(id), details TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, created TIMESTAMP DEFAULT now() NOT NULL )
